articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Syrian President, IIJI Director General
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Syrian President, IIJI Director General
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to the president of the Syrian Arab Republic and the director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) in reply to their congratulatory messages on the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In the messages he expressed deep thanks for sending warm congratulations and best wishes on the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He wished them good health and bigger successes in their work.
					
					 He also sent a reply message to the co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.

articles.title: DPRK FM Leaves for Sweden
articles.content:
DPRK FM Leaves for Sweden
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Yong Ho and his party left here on Thursday to visit the Kingdom of Sweden.
					 During the visit Ri Yong Ho will meet with Swedish Foreign Minister Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom to exchange views on the bilateral relations and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: DPRK National Paralympic Committee Delegation Here
articles.content:
DPRK National Paralympic Committee Delegation Here
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the National Paralympic Committee of the DPRK led by Chairman of the C.C., Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled Kim Mun Chol arrived here on Thursday after attending the 12th Winter Paralympics being held in south Korea.
					 The delegation came here via Kaesong, together with the players' group after the completion of its matches.

articles.title: Congratulations to Chancellor of Germany
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chancellor of Germany
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Angela Merkel on her re-assumption of the important duty as chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany.
					 Expressing the belief that the relations between the DPRK and Germany would develop on good terms in line with the desire and interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished her bigger successes in her work. 
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Heiko Maas upon his appointment as foreign minister of Germany.

articles.title: Remodeling of Samjiyon County Goes on in DPRK
articles.content:
Remodeling of Samjiyon County Goes on in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Preparations have been made for the second-stage project to spruce up Samjiyon County in the DPRK.
					 According to an official concerned, the headquarters of the 216 Division makes steady preparations to hit a higher goal for this year, following up the achievements it gained last year.
					
					 Attaching priority to the function and role of designing office of the division, the headquarters strive to keep designing ahead of others in close cooperation with relevant designing institutions.
					
					 The electric power network is now under reexamination and reconstituted in a rational way.
					
					 All the units under the division have been encouraged to adopt valuable technical innovations, while its brigades taking due measures to secure building materials like block, timber, cement and reinforcing bar.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Study Tour Starts
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Study Tour Starts
Phophyong, March 16 (KCNA) -- There began study tour of schoolchildren from across the country on the occasion of the 95th anniversary of the 250-mile journey for learning made by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The journey made by the President at 11 was a patriotic and revolutionary one through which he set a great aim to know the country well, crush the Japanese imperialists by the Korean people themselves and liberate the country.
					
					 The tour group will leave Phophyong and arrive in Mangyongdae through the 250-mile journey made by the President.
					
					 A ceremony for starting the tour took place in Phophyong, Kim Hyong Jik County, Ryanggang Province on Mar. 16.
					
					 Attending it were officials concerned and youth league officials, study tour group members and schoolchildren of the county.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statue of the President at the Phophyong Revolutionary Site made a bow to him.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called on all the study tour group members to bear in mind the lofty revolutionary will of the President and his burning hatred against the enemy and warm love for the country and the people.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the study tour group members left Phophyong.
					
					 Officials, working people and schoolchildren in the county gave a good send-off to them.

articles.title: Patriotic Journey Made by Peerless Patriot
articles.content:
Patriotic Journey Made by Peerless Patriot
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- It has been 95 years since President Kim Il Sung made a 250-mile journey for learning with a firm resolve to restore the country's independence.
					 Keeping deep in mind his father's intention that a man born in Korea must know Korea well, Kim Il Sung crossed the River Amnok in his teens on March 16, Juche 12 (1923).
					
					 The journey from Badaogou of China to Mangyongdae of Korea was very long and difficult, but he felt painful seeing the tragic state of the motherland that was groaning under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, and fostered the surging hatred against the Japanese imperialists and exploiters.
					
					 In his reminiscences "With the Century", the President said:
					
					 I had spent only two years back in my motherland, but I had learned and experienced much in those years. My most valuable experience was to have acquired a deep understanding of our people. Our people were simple, and industrious yet brave and strong-willed.
					
					 The President came to have a firmer belief that he could liberate the country from Japan's colonial rule if he organized the efforts of the people properly. And with this belief, he had waged the twenty years of anti-Japanese armed struggle relying on the popular masses to liberate the country.
					
					 He opened up the Juche-oriented path of the Korean revolution and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, performing great feats on behalf of the country and history in his lifetime.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Disgusting Acts of S. Korean Conservatives
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Disgusting Acts of S. Korean Conservatives
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservative group of south Korea have been greatly embarrassed to go desperate in their moves to chill the atmosphere of the Korean peninsula in which the tension has made a U-turn toward detente following the proactive measure the DPRK took on its own initiative.
					 Representative of the LKP Hong Jun Phyo is deriding the present phase for dialogue, saying that "one should not be taken in by the camouflaged peace offensive" and insulting it as "south-north peace farce mentioning only nuclear suspension, not nuclear dismantlement". The floor leader and the spokesman for the same party also appeared at public presentations where they spouted such rubbish that "the north's intention and sincerity are doubtful" and "the principle of sanctions on the north should never be undermined".
					
					 This is the desperate efforts of the worst traitors who are destined to meet a miserable end, after being marginalized from the trend of the history toward national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 The principled stand and the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to write a new history of national reunification to be proud of to the world by the concerted efforts of the nation and to defend peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and the world have been warmly supported and welcomed by all the Koreans and the international community.
					
					 But only the LKP and other conservative forces of south Korea are working desperately to reverse the favorable climate for reconciliation, unity and peace into the unfavorable one of confrontation, and are spewing out rhetoric, challenging the desire of the nation and the trend of the times.
					
					 Far from apologizing for the hideous crimes of undermining the June 15 era of reunification which was making favorable progress and of pushing the situation to the touch-and-go one, those forces have gone vicious in their moves to check the trend for the improvement of the north-south ties. This disgusting behavior has been spitted at by all Koreans and the international community.
					
					 It was none other than the south Korean conservative forces that did not hesitate to commit the traitorous crimes against reunification, describing the valuable June 15 era of reunification as "lost decade" and totally denying the north-south joint declarations. It was again the south Korean conservatives who scuttled the north-south authorities talks that were arranged with so much effort by the active step taken by the DPRK in June 2013 by claiming the absurd issue of "level and ranking".
					
					 If the north-south relations make improvement, it is clear that their crimes of having escalated confrontation, being dead-set to the nation's reconciliation, unity and national reunification in the past, and of having created the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula will be highlighted and they will face stronger denunciation and rejection by the public mindset.
					
					 It is out of this calculation that they are working with bloodshot eyes to nip in the bud the sprouts for national reconciliation and unity with all possible means and methods in order to keep the north-south relations in the stalled state forever.
					
					 The conservative forces who stoop to any infamy to meet their dirty political ambition are senseless traitors and a group of rabid dogs that have no blood and soul of being part of the Korean nation as they are only keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Koreans and all other Korean people are required to wage more courageous actions to throw overboard the group of conservative traitors, a cancer-like entity in the way for peace and reunification.

articles.title: Imperialists' Moves for Expanding Sphere of Domination Slammed
articles.content:
Imperialists' Moves for Expanding Sphere of Domination Slammed
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday slams the imperialists for their open interference in the internal affairs of other countries and aggression on them under the deceptive slogans "peace" and "ensuring security" in a bid to achieve their hegemonic purpose.
					 The article says:
					
					 The world progressives and countries aspiring after independence have to see through the hegemonic moves of the imperialists veiled with falsehood and deception and counter them with vigilance.
					
					 The "peace" much touted by the imperialists precisely means the slogan for aggression for expanding the sphere of domination.
					
					 They are finding their way out of ruin in escalating the invasion of other countries and the meddling in their internal affairs.
					
					 It is proven by the present reality that sovereignty of countries and nations is violated and there are ceaseless wars and disputes in different countries due to the aggression and interference by the imperialist and hegemonic forces.
					
					 The moves to maintain and expand the sphere of domination by the U.S.-led imperialists are doomed to fail as they are outdated and reactionary ones going against the trend of the times toward independence.
					
					 The arbitrary practices and blusters of the imperialists rampant in the international arena are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the doomed reactionaries of history.
					
					 No challenge of the imperialists can ever stop mankind from building an independent world.

articles.title: Punishment of Park Geun Hye Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Park Geun Hye Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Consultative Council of Families of Victims and the April 16 Solidarity of south Korea held a rally at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on March 10 in demand of the urgent probe into the truth behind the Ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of Seoul.
					 Speakers at the rally charged that the "Constitutional Court" did not deal with the ferry disaster when Park Geun Hye was impeached one year ago.
					
					 Park did not fulfill her duty as "president" but committed the extra-large disaster, they deplored.
					
					 They urged the "government" to actively conduct probe into the truth behind the Ferry Sewol disaster.

articles.title: Imprisonment of Lee Myung Bak Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Imprisonment of Lee Myung Bak Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- More than 20 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Social Progress held a joint press conference outside the Prosecutor's Office in Seoul in demand of the prompt imprisonment of traitor Lee Myung Bak on March 14, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that Lee Myung Bak cooked up a large fraud related with BBK before he became the "president" and glossed over his crimes by dint of power.
					
					 Scandals and crimes of Lee Myung Bak through power privatization were not confined to prosecution investigation, they said, adding that he sparked off uproar of the people through humiliating negotiation on FTA with the U.S., the import of American beef causing mad cow disease, etc.
					
					 They demanded that the prosecution fully investigate into the power-backed scandals of Lee and his confidants and relatives and imprison him.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Belarus on March 9.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the President's revolutionary career and exploits through media and organize political and cultural events such as celebration meeting on the occasion of his 106th birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on March 6.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the President's birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a personalidades extranjeras
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a personalidades extranjeras
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio los mensajes de respuesta al presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria y al director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche quienes le remitieron los mensajes de felicitacion con motivo del aniversario 76 de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En las misivas, el Maximo Dirigente expreso profundo agradecimiento a los destinatarios y formulo votos por la salud de ellos y mayores exitos en sus trabajos.
					
					Kim Jong Un envio un mensaje de respuesta tambien al copresidente del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Canciller coreano parte para visitar a Suecia
articles.content:
Canciller coreano parte para visitar a Suecia
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, y su comitiva salieron hoy de esta capital para realizar una visita al Reino de Suecia.
					Durante su visita, Ri Yong Ho intercambiara con su homologa sueca Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom las opiniones sobre las relaciones bilaterales y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Regresa la delegacion del Comite Nacional Paralimpico de la RPDC
articles.content:
Regresa la delegacion del Comite Nacional Paralimpico de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Comite Nacional Paralimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea, Kim Mun Chol, regreso el dia 15 a esta capital tras tomar parte en los XII Juegos Paralimpicos Invernales, efectuados en el Sur de Corea. 
					La delegacion llego via Kaesong junto con el grupo de jugadores de la RPDC que concluyo su programa de juegos.

articles.title: Conmemoran 95o aniversario de la caminata de mil ries para el estudio
articles.content:
Conmemoran 95o aniversario de la caminata de mil ries para el estudio
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se cumplen 95 anos desde cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung realizara en su adolescencia la caminata de mil ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros) para el estudio.
					Este dia (16 de marzo), el pueblo coreano recuerda ese viaje que emprendio el lider antecesor con la voluntad de conocer mejor la situacion de la patria y el pueblo bajo el coloniaje japones en aquel entonces.
					
					Siguiendo las instrucciones de su padre Kim Hyong Jik de que el hombre nacido en Corea debe conocer bien su patria, el inicio el 16 de marzo del 12 (1923) de la Era Juche la caminata desde Badaogou de China hasta Mangyongdae de Corea.
					
					En el largo y arduo trayecto, ha sido testigo presencial de las indecibles desgracias y sufrimientos impuestos a la nacion coreana por los odiosos colonizadores japoneses y la clase explotadora como terratenientes y capitalistas.
					
					Posteriormente, el Presidente escribio en sus memorias "En el Transcurso del Siglo" como sigue: 
					
					"Aunque pase solo dos anos en la patria, aprendi y experimente mucho. La mas valiosa experiencia fue que llegue a comprender profundamente a mi pueblo. Un pueblo modesto y laborioso, valiente y firme".
					
					Convencido de que podra restaurar la patria si organizaba y movilizaba con acierto a tal pueblo, el desarrollo la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa de varios decenios y logro por fin liberar el pais. 
					
					Gracias a la caminata, comenzo la revolucion coreana del Juche y se construyo en esta tierra la potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y autodefensiva. 
					
					En toda su vida desde entonces, el Presidente Kim Il Sung acumulo grandes hazanas por la patria y la historia.

articles.title: ACNC comenta conducta de conservadores surcoreanos contra la corriente actual
articles.content:
ACNC comenta conducta de conservadores surcoreanos contra la corriente actual
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Inquietados de la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que se dirige rapido a la distension segun las medidas protagonicas de la RPDC, el "Partido de Corea Libre" (PCL) y otros conservadores surcoreanos hacen todo lo posible para revertirla. 
					El representante del PCL, Hong Jun Phyo, esta insultando casi todos los dias el actual estado de dialogo chismeando que "no deben ser enganados por la ofensiva de paz disfrazada" y "esta es farsa de paz Sur-Norte encaminada a la suspension temporal del programa nuclear no a su cancelacion". 
					
					A su vez, el representante parlamentario del PCL y su vocero hablan con griteria que "son dudosas la intencion y la sinceridad del Norte" y "es imperioso no abandonar nunca el principio de sancion anti-Norte".
					
					Esto deviene el ultimo pataleo de los traidores que se hallan a punto del fin tragico siendo expulsados de la corriente de la historia hacia la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion. 
					
					Son aplaudidos por todos los connacionales y la sociedad internacional la posicion de principios y los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC por escribir con la fuerza unida nacional la nueva historia de reunificacion de la patria y preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Pero, solo el PCL y otros conservadores surcoreanos desafian a la aspiracion nacional y la corriente de la epoca obstinandose en impedir la reconciliacion, la unidad y la paz.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional repudian la conducta repugnante de ellos que tratan de impedir la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas en vez de pedir disculpa por sus crimenes de haber roto la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio, que se desarrollaba favorablemente, y llevado la situacion al umbral de guerra.
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos no vacilaron en cometer los crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de negar totalmente las declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas describiendo la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio como el "decenio perdido". Y con su insistencia absurda en el "nivel" y "rango", llevaron al fracaso las conversaciones de autoridades N-S, preparadas en junio de 2013 gracias a la iniciativa de la RPDC. 
					
					Ellos saben muy bien que una vez mejorados los vinculos intercoreanos, seran repudiados duramente por la poblacion al ponerse de relieve sus crimenes de haber aumentado el peligro de guerra de la Peninsula Coreana entregandose a la confrontacion.
					
					Esos fanaticos de enfrentamiento fratricida son traidores capaces de cualquier cosa para realizar su sucia ambicion politica.
					
					Todos los connacionales deberan desarrollar con osadia la lucha por sepultar a los vendepatrias conservadores surcoreanos.
